name: Subspace Discovery
description:
Single-Server MMO Universe

Explore, mine, build, research, and fight in space - alone with friends or a corporation.

Experience the ultimate MMO on our single server worldwide architecture. Say goodbye to queue times, deserted servers or server merging. All your friends are on the same server, so you can easily team up and conquer the vastness of Subspace.

Cross-Play

After Early-Access and with the worldwide launch, cross-play for seamless gaming across platforms and shared purchases are planned.

Mine Asteroids for Resources

Valuable resources from asteroids can be used to build ships, equipment, to research or construct a base.

Evolving Story

Venture deeper into space to uncover the mysteries of the alien invaders.

Instead of being the 1000th player to kill 5 rats or deliver bread to the baker, you are working with all players to proceed through the storyline and find the source of the invasion. Your actions and rewards will become part of your legacy.

Defeat Invader

Combat enemies or fight epic battles.

Outfit your ship to be a tank or damage dealer, use brutal force or cunning tactics to emerge victorious.

United Path

Players must join forces to solve weekly events together. The path ahead is shaped by the actions of everyone.

Events drive the story of Subspace Discovery and brings players together to work towards a common goal. They progress towards uncovering he mysteries of the invasion, sharing in success or failure.

Don’t wait any longer, join the adventure now!
